name: Cybersecurity
description:
This online course helps particpants understand online security and protecting their digital life, whether at home or work.
Participants will learn how to recognise threats that could harm them online and how to take steps to protect themselves.
The course will frame online safety in the context of the wider world, introducing concepts like malware, viruses, trojans, network security, cryptography, identity theft and risk management.
The course was supported by the UK Government's National Cyber Security Programme, is GCHQ Certified Training and IISP accredited.

To prove completion of this online course, the student must provide a copy of the course completion certificate provided by the course provider. We also have access to the Course Provider system and can verifiy % complete and level of interaction with the course if there is any doubt about the level of engagement.
